mn143:2.3: pāde sirasā vandāhi → vandāhi evañca vadehi (s1-3, km, pts1), bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi → vandāhi evañca vadehi (s1-3, km, pts1)
mn143:4.2: muddhani → muddhānaṃ (s1-3, km, pts1), abhimattheyya → abhimantheyya (bj), ūhananti → ohananti (s1-3, km)
mn143:4.4: sāriputta, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā → adhimattā vātā sīsaṃ parikantanti (bj, s1-3, km)
